reg.title:
Additional Tax Regulation for the
Regional District of East Kootenay (Invermere Area)

section.sectiontext: In this regulation, Act means the Hotel Room Tax Act.

January 31, 2009, is the prescribed date after which section 3 of the Act applies in respect of accommodation purchased in the District of Invermere and in a portion of the Regional District of East Kootenay Electoral Area F, shown in Schedule A attached to the Regional District of East Kootenay — Additional Hotel Room Tax Bylaw No. 2111, 2008 (Invermere Area).

section.marginalnote: Prescribed rate of additional tax payable
section.sectiontext: The additional tax payable under section 3 (1) of the Act is 2% of the purchase price of accommodation purchased in the District of Invermere and in a portion of the Regional District of East Kootenay Electoral Area F, shown in Schedule A attached to the Regional District of East Kootenay — Additional Hotel Room Tax Bylaw No. 2111, 2008 (Invermere Area).

section.marginalnote: Prescribed purpose for expenditure of additional tax
section.sectiontext: The Regional District of East Kootenay may spend the amount paid to it out of the revenue collected from the additional tax for tourism marketing, programs and projects.
This regulation is repealed effective February 1, 2014.

footnote.footnotetext: See section 45 of the Provincial Sales Tax Transitional Provisions and Amendments Act, 2013, S.B.C. 2013, c. 1
